PService.name: Warehouse

policy.name: Policy for service #50462773, Warehouse
policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><wsp:Policy xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy" xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:BridgeRoutingAssertion> <L7p:Login stringValue="test1"/> <L7p:Password stringValue="password"/> <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://bra-test.localdomain:8080/bra/ssg2_httpbasic"/> <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:RequestHeaderRules> <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/> </L7p:RequestParamRules> <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules> <L7p:SamlAssertionVersion intValue="2"/> </L7p:BridgeRoutingAssertion> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>

PService.wsdlXml: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:tm="http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/" xmlns:tns="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:types> <s:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws"> <s:element name="listProducts"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="delay" type="s:int"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="listProductsResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="listProductsResult" type="tns:ArrayOfProductListHeader"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfProductListHeader"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="ProductListHeader" nillable="true" type="tns:ProductListHeader"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="ProductListHeader"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="productName" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="productId" type="s:long"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:element name="getProductDetails"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="productid" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="delay" type="s:int"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="getProductDetailsResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="getProductDetailsResult" type="tns:ProductDetails"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ProductDetails"> <s:complexContent mixed="false"> <s:extension base="tns:ProductListHeader"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="description" type="s:string"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="price" type="s:float"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="inStock" type="s:boolean"/> </s:sequence> </s:extension> </s:complexContent> </s:complexType> <s:element name="placeOrder"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="productid" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="amount" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="price" type="s:float"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="accountid" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="delay" type="s:int"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="placeOrderResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="placeOrderResult" type="s:long"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="currentOrders"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="accountid" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="delay" type="s:int"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:element name="currentOrdersResponse"> <s:complexType> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="currentOrdersResult" type="tns:ArrayOfOrder"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:element> <s:complexType name="ArrayOfOrder"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="Order" nillable="true" type="tns:Order"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> <s:complexType name="Order"> <s:sequence> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="date" type="s:dateTime"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="accountId" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="productId" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="amount" type="s:long"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="price" type="s:float"/> <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="confirmationId" type="s:long"/> </s:sequence> </s:complexType> </s:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="listProductsSoapIn"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listProducts" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listProductsSoapOut"> <wsdl:part element="tns:listProductsResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getProductDetailsSoapIn"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getProductDetails" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getProductDetailsSoapOut"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getProductDetailsResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="placeOrderSoapIn"> <wsdl:part element="tns:placeOrder" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="placeOrderSoapOut"> <wsdl:part element="tns:placeOrderResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="currentOrdersSoapIn"> <wsdl:part element="tns:currentOrders" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="currentOrdersSoapOut"> <wsdl:part element="tns:currentOrdersResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="WarehouseSoap"> <wsdl:operation name="listProducts"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listProductsSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:listProductsSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getProductDetails"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getProductDetailsSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getProductDetailsSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="placeOrder"> <wsdl:input message="tns:placeOrderSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:placeOrderSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="currentOrders"> <wsdl:input message="tns:currentOrdersSoapIn"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:currentOrdersSoapOut"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="WarehouseSoap" type="tns:WarehouseSoap"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="listProducts"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/listProducts" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getProductDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/getProductDetails" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="placeOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/placeOrder" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="currentOrders"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/currentOrders" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:binding name="WarehouseSoap12" type="tns:WarehouseSoap"> <soap12:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="listProducts"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/listProducts" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getProductDetails"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/getProductDetails" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="placeOrder"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/placeOrder" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="currentOrders"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://warehouse.acme.com/ws/currentOrders" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="Warehouse"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:WarehouseSoap" name="WarehouseSoap"> <soap:address location="http://hugh/ACMEWarehouseWS/Service1.asmx"/> </wsdl:port> <wsdl:port binding="tns:WarehouseSoap12" name="WarehouseSoap12"> <soap12:address location="http://hugh/ACMEWarehouseWS/Service1.asmx"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
